CustomField.formula: CASE ( vlocity_ins__LengthUnit__c , "Seconds", (vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c/86400), "Business Hours", (vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c/24), "Calendar Hours", (vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c/24), "Business Days", (vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c/1), "Calendar Days", (vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c/1), 0 )
CustomField.label: Duration (in days)
